patthana1.5:121.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cha … pe … napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke cha, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte tīṇi … pe … novigate cha.

patthana1.5:263.19: Dibbena cakkhunā upādinnupādāniyaṃ rūpaṃ passati, cetopariyañāṇena upādinnupādāniyacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti.
patthana1.5:263.20: Upādinnupādāniyā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.5:264.1: Anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.5:264.2: dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati, ariyā gotrabhuṃ paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ paccavekkhanti, ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti;
patthana1.5:264.8: anupādinnupādāniye khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti;

patthana1.5:470.1: Nahetuyā catuvīsati, naārammaṇe catuvīsati, naadhipatiyā catuvīsati, naanantare catuvīsati, nasamanantare catuvīsati, nasahajāte vīsati, naaññamaññe vīsati, nanissaye vīsati, naupanissaye tevīsati, napurejāte tevīsati, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane catuvīsati, nakamme catuvīsati, navipāke catuvīsati, naāhāre vīsati, naindriye bāvīsati, najhāne catuvīsati, namagge catuvīsati, nasampayutte vīsati, navippayutte cuddasa, noatthiyā nava, nonatthiyā catuvīsati, novigate catuvīsati, noavigate nava.
